name: market for fodder beet, Swiss integrated production | fodder beet, Swiss integrated production | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/904/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'fodder beet, Swiss integrated production', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;The product 'fodder beet, Swiss integrated production' is a grain. It is an annual crop. Swiss integrated production refers to agriculture meeting the ecological requirements (ökologischer Leistungsnachweis, ÖLN) defined by the Swiss regulation on direct payments to agriculture (Direktzahlungsverordnung).

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'fodder beet, Swiss integrated production',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'fodder beet, Swiss integrated production',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
